segments.text: I am watching the water from the sink, and it’s getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is fully open, and the drain is clearly not functioning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the basin edge in a constant, relentless flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a shiny sheet down the cabinet doors, ruining them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is expanding rapidly, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can imagine the damage it's doing to the wooden cabinets and floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to be a huge, expensive mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there is completely unaware, still polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s infuriating how easily this could have been prevented.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone just needed to notice the running water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer waste of water is also quite bothersome to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a testament to unchecked domestic disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope the damage isn't too extensive in the end.
segments.speaker: PAR
